episode: My dog had recently been killed by a car. Here's my best friend he went everywhere with me we were always together literally and now he's no longer with me everywhere I went reminded me of him. I felt very lonely without him.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was really tragic with my dog was killed it's one thing if they were old or sick but when they're killed unexpectedly it's really sad I thought so lonely without him because he was always with mel

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Losing a pet suddenly is heartbreaking.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's one thing to lose a pet to sickness or old age but when they die tragically and unexpectedly it is really hard. He was my best friend and he went everywhere with me. I was so lonely without him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds incredibly tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was he kept me from being afraid. He was all I had for a long time since I have no family locally and no close friends.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: He was more than just a pet, a true companion.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I still cry unexpectedly about silly things like walking down the pet food aisle in the store.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those little reminders can be really tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes several people offered to give me a puppy but I didn't want one at first then I thought how it would be like a rainbow baby and maybe I needed that

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A new pup could bring new joy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A friend talked me into checking out some puppies that would be very small and one latched on to me and would not let go I had to take him and named him RB for rainbow.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Aw, that's beautiful! RB is a perfect name.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He was born close to the time my other dog died and he has the same colors and markings he is really smart and friendly and is always with me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: RB sounds like a sweet blessing.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I still miss BooBoo but I am not lonely anymore.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: RB's filled a big void, hasn't he?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes but I forgot how much energy puppies have luckily he has a friend who has play dates with him a few times a week.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Playdates are a lifesaver, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes he is so playful and friendly he was getting sad from my grumpy old dog not wanting to play and my two cats running away from him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad he's got a buddy now to burn off energy!
